titles: The carefull wife's good counsel: or, The husband's firm resolution to reform his life, and to lay something against a rainy day. To the tune of The spinning-wheel. Licensed according to order.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, J. Back.,
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse - "Kind husband, if you mean to thrive ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
